==== '''''About me''''' ====

My name is Bence Papp, I was born in 1989 and live in a town(Nagykanizsa) in Hungary. IT is one of my hobbies. I am an enthusiastic Ubuntu user (Ubuntu 10.04 LTS 32 bit). I'm translating Ubuntu to Hungarian. I have a Gateway Laptop. I like it :))))
